subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing
author: lori bogren
full_text:
--_b8749333-fd41-4ac5-adb0-76674f82b621_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


April~

 

So my next question would be, how do you know it wouldn't be "p=
rankster".  Providing accurate information until a personal question about =
itself was asked and then mislead?

 

~Lori

PS:  Did I tell you there's a=
 running joke amongst my friends about my paranoia?  :)




"My life is bor=
ing, my fantasies are a theme park." 
--Anne Rice  Responding to an intervi=
ewer who just did not get it. 


 



To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
From: apr=
il@...
Date: Sat, 11 Apr 2009 16:55:22 -0600
Subje=
ct: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing








I would try it both ways -sol=
o and with another person. However I would limit it to just me and one othe=
r trustworthy person.
 
 
"How would you go about determining/verified whet=
her it's a ghost (someone stuck in between life and the other side), a spir=
it (someone that's crossed over and came back to say high) and some other t=
ype of entity?"
 
Only after establishing that I am indeed communicating wi=
th a spirit, and that spirit has given me trustworthy info consistently, at=
 that point I would simply ask what it's nature is.
 
April
 

----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
From: lori bogren 
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
Sent: Sat=
urday, April 11, 2009 2:48 PM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing



Apr=
il~
 
Are you planning on doing this solo or working with a team?
 
How wou=
ld you go about determining/verified whether it's a ghost (someone stuck in=
 between life and the other side), a spirit (someone that's crossed over an=
d came back to say high) and some other type of entity?
 
~Lori



"My life=
 is boring, my fantasies are a theme park." 
--Anne Rice  Responding to an =
interviewer who just did not get it. 


  



To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
F=
rom: april@...
Date: Fri, 10 Apr 2009 22:37:13 -06=
00
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.

=






Well, if my husband would let me actually experiment with one, that w=
ould be the first step LOL!
 
But what I would try and do is get some kind =
of verifiable information from the "entity" that I contact with the board t=
o prove that it is communication from an actual, intelligent being and not =
just my own motor responses making he planchette move. It would have to be =
information that I have no knowledge of.
 
If I could do that, and consiste=
ntly, then I would be comfortable saying that I am actually talking to a sp=
irit.
 
The reason I have my doubts is that you have to be touching the pla=
nchette to get it to move. If it were an actual spirit, I would think that =
shouldn't be necessary. We all know ghosts can a do move objects.
 
But thi=
s brings up another mystery - if the Ouija board is actual spirit communica=
tion, maybe there is a difference between the entities you can contact with=
 it and your common ghost.
 
April
 

----- Original Message ----- 
From: l=
ori bogren 
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
Sent: Friday, April 10, 2009 9:50 =
PM
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.

=


April~
 
Hm, finally I'm intrigued again.
 
How do you about the process?=

 
~Lori



"My life is boring, my fantasies are a theme park." 
--Anne Ric=
e  Responding to an interviewer who just did not get it. 


  



To: EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com
From: april@...
Date: Fri, 10 A=
pr 2009 18:36:30 -0600
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual g=
host hunter stuff.



.

When it comes to the Ouija, I just want to study i=
t to find out if it is really spirit communication, or just kinetic energy =
or your subconscious mind moving the planchette.
 
I agree that we all have=
 the ability for extra sensory perception, just some are better at it than =
others. Like running, for instance. We all can run, but some are naturally =
better at it. Still, with practice we can get better.
 

But that is not my=
 aim with the Ouija.
 
 

----- Original Message ----- 
From: lori bogren 
=
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
Sent: Friday, April 10, 2009 6:11 PM
Subject: =
RE: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.



April~
 
Y=
ou forgot yawn from boredom, that's what I do.
 
Use it, don't use it.  I d=
on't care.  But why bother.  When people ask me I usually suggest that if t=
hey want to communicate with ... whatever why not develop the ability yours=
elf.  - ya, I'm one of those who believe anyone can.
 
There's always the q=
uestion in the back of your mind whether your partner's moving it.  The int=
entions of "what" you are talking to.  Not to mention it's too slow and lim=
ited.
 
Besides if you take the time to develop the ability you can get mor=
e texture in the information.  Asking the board "where you married?" may ge=
t you a "yes" but a psychic might get the sense of a religious or civil cer=
emonhy, the garment(s) worn, other's in the party, or whether that Being ap=
proved/disapproved of their spouse (ie was it a reluctant union).
 
~Lori
